text: "Until the End of the World" is a 1991 promo song by Irish rock band U2. It is the fourth track from their seventh studio album Achtung Baby. It was taken from the 1991 Wim Wenders movie Until the End of the World. It went to number 69 in Canada and number 4 on the Billboard Alternative Airplay chart. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:U2 songs Category:Patti Smith songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Until the End of the World (song)
